content:
Mobai says if conditions allow,
he'll build a new station in the future,
then I can take everyone to all sorts of places!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
There are worlds with swirling sandstorms, worlds with dancing snowflakes,
and even worlds with rivers of rainbow quicksand!
Doesn't that sound like fun?
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content: Oh right, congratulations again on completing your new house!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
Hm? I was watching fish jump out of the water...
You know what? There's this guy in our association,
who got drunk and stumbled into unknown rapids all by himself!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎
莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
The seniors at Driftingale Association,
They love nothing more than gathering around the fire with their wine jugs after meals,
They often say—
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
That's incredible!
I wish I could have such an exciting adventure too~
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content: When his head cleared up, he found himself in a strange place. A place where fish and lobsters were floating in the sky!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content: Of course, I won't drive recklessly when there are passengers.
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content: We were all so worried about him, but he came back with a grin plastered on his face!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
The seniors at the Qianfeng Association always say,
though passing through rough turbulence can be troublesome,
there are lots of wonderful surprises waiting on the other side!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
"Storms make stronger sailors."
They say the more dangerous the turbulent waters,
The more rare treasures they hide.
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
Don't forget to come see me!
I'm planning to apply for a construction site,
Look forward to it~!
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
I know I don't have a housewarming gift for you right now,
but whenever you want to craft more furniture,
or visit other places...
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎

content:
Without even realizing it, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
you've made quite a wonderful life
for yourself.
info: 莎莎保底闲聊（待删）_莎莎
